org.kiji.schema.zookeeper
Class ZooKeeperUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.zookeeper.ZooKeeperUtils

@ApiAudience.Framework
@ApiStability.Evolving
@Inheritance.Sealed
public final class ZooKeeperUtils
extends Object

Utility class which holds constants and utitily methods for working with ZooKeeper.

getInstanceDir

public static File getInstanceDir(KijiURI kijiURI)
Reports the ZooKeeper node path for a Kiji instance.

Parameters:
kijiURI - URI of a Kiji instance to report the ZooKeeper node path for.
Returns:
the ZooKeeper node path for a Kiji instance.

getInstancePermissionsLock

public static File getInstancePermissionsLock(KijiURI instanceURI)
Reports the path of the ZooKeeper node for permissions changes locking.

Parameters:
instanceURI - URI of the instance for which to get a lock for permissions changes.
Returns:
the path of the ZooKeeper node used as a lock for permissions changes.

getInstanceTablesDir

public static File getInstanceTablesDir(KijiURI kijiURI)
Reports the ZooKeeper root path containing all tables in a Kiji instance.

Parameters:
kijiURI - URI of a Kiji instance to report the ZooKeeper node path for.
Returns:
the ZooKeeper node path that contains all the tables in the specified Kiji instance.

getTableLayoutFile

public static File getTableLayoutFile(KijiURI tableURI)
Reports the path of the ZooKeeper node containing the most recent version of a table's layout.

Parameters:
tableURI - Reports the path of the ZooKeeper node that contains the most recent layout version of the Kiji table identified by this URI.
Returns:
the path of the ZooKeeper node that contains the most recent layout version of the specified Kiji table.

getTableUsersDir

public static File getTableUsersDir(KijiURI tableURI)
Reports the path of the ZooKeeper node where users of a table register themselves.

Parameters:
tableURI - Reports the path of the ZooKeeper node where users of the Kiji table with this URI register themselves.
Returns:
the path of the ZooKeeper node where users of a table register.

getTableLayoutUpdateLock

public static File getTableLayoutUpdateLock(KijiURI tableURI)
Reports the path of the ZooKeeper node for table layout update locking.

Parameters:
tableURI - Reports the path of the ZooKeeper node used to create locks for table layout updates.
Returns:
the path of the ZooKeeper node used to create locks for table layout updates.

setTableLayout

public static void setTableLayout(org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework zkClient,
                                  KijiURI tableURI,
                                  String layoutID)
                           throws IOException
Updates the table layout ID in ZooKeeper. This will notify all watchers of the table layout.

The caller must ensure proper locking of table layout update operations.

Parameters:
zkClient - connection to ZooKeeper.
tableURI - Notify the users of the table with this URI.
layoutID - Encoded layout update for the table with the specified URI.
Throws:
IOException - on unrecoverable ZooKeeper error.

newTableLayoutLock

public static ZooKeeperLock newTableLayoutLock(org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework zkClient,
                                               KijiURI tableURI)
Return a Lock instance which must be aquired before updating a table layout.

Parameters:
zkClient - connection to ZooKeeper.
tableURI - of table to be updated.
Returns:
a Lock for updating the table's layout.

makeZKNodeName

public static String makeZKNodeName(String userId,
                                    String layoutId)
Constructs the ZooKeeper node name for the specified user ID and layout ID.

Parameters:
userId - ID of the user to construct a ZooKeeper node for.
layoutId - ID of the table layout to construct a ZooKeeper node for.
Returns:
the ZooKeeper node for the specified user ID and layout ID.

wrapAndRethrow

public static void wrapAndRethrow(Exception e)
                           throws IOException
Takes any Exception and rethrows it if it is an IOException, or wraps it in a KijiIOException and throws that.

Parameters:
e - exception to be wrapped.
Throws:
IOException - if the provided exception is an IOException.
KijiIOException - for any other Exception type.

getZooKeeperClient

public static org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework getZooKeeperClient(String zkEnsemble)
Create a new ZooKeeper connection to the provided ensemble. The returned client is already started, but the caller is responsible for closing it.

Parameters:
zkEnsemble - to connect to.
Returns:
a ZooKeeper client using the new connection.

getZooKeeperClient

public static org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework getZooKeeperClient(KijiURI instanceURI)
Create a new ZooKeeper connection to the provided instance. The returned client is already started, but the caller is responsible for closing it.

Parameters:
instanceURI - of cluster to connect to.
Returns:
a ZooKeeper client using the new connection.
